title: Riding for the disabled
creator_credit: Antonius Kroger and Kuratorium fur Therapeutisches
brief_description: A demonstration of how horses and horse riding are used as therapy for mentally handicapped children. Shows how the therapeutic techniques help develop both physical and social skills.
